subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Knicks have offered Amar’e Stoudemire a maximum contract, but he might not have much to offer that the Knicks didn’t already have with the cheaper David Lee.
snippet: The Knicks have offered Amar’e Stoudemire a maximum contract, but he might not have much to offer that the Knicks didn’t already have with the cheaper David Lee.
